alert.note: Alert for Hancock (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:43PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hancock and south central Pearl River Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 143 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Picayune, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Picayune and Mcneil. This includes Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 4 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
